title: Starsector 0.7.1a-RC5
description:
Starsector 0.7.1a-RC5

PLEASE SEED! I can't run the PC 24/7, so if the torrent seems abandoned, add it anyway and wait until I start the PC. Should be working most work days (Europe) morning to evening.

IF YOU LIKE THE GAME, PLEASE BUY IT!
 
http://fractalsoftworks.com

Install guide:
1. Run the installer
2. When first starting the game, copy the key from "CD key.txt"


Changelog 0.7.1a
Faction commissions â€“ align with a faction to fight their enemies and gain access to their technology
Faction hostilities â€“ take advantage of opportunities presented by temporary hostilities between major factions
A much easier easy difficulty
Higher sensor ranges during the early game
Lots of bugfixes and a few balance adjustments

Changelog 0.7a
Expanded battles â€“ come to the aid of beleaguered allies, or be swarmed by enemies
Campaign terrain â€“ nebulas, stellar coronas, hyperspace storms, and more
Sensors â€“ play cat and mouse games with enemy fleets or patrols seeking to ruin your smuggling run
Abilities â€“ â€œgo darkâ€ to hide in a ring system, or use â€œemergency burnâ€ to chase down a pirate
Combat officers â€“ hire and level up officers to power up the ships you assign them to
Campaign missions to take on for profit
Faction and reputation-specific music
Six new star systems, five new ships, and three new weapons
